name: osteopath
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Europe, a person who is trained to treat injuries to bones and muscles using pressure and movement: The osteopath raised my arm and shook it. Spinal manipulation by a chiropractor or osteopath can be effective at treating chronic back pain.
in the United States and Canada, a doctor who is trained in osteopathic medicine (= a system of medicine that emphasizes the care of the whole person, using the latest scientific treatments and also sometimes treating injuries to bones and muscles using pressure and movement): Osteopaths are trained to be generalists first and specialists second. Like MDs, osteopaths prescribe drugs and recommend tests and surgery. Synonym
Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine
